sentences.en: All the hotel’s bedrooms are light and airy.
sentences.cn: 这家酒店的所有客房都明亮通风。

sentences.en: Giving them an airy wave of his hand, the Commander sailed past.
sentences.cn: 这位海军中校随意地朝他们挥挥手便扬帆而过。

sentences.en: Hang it in an airy place.
He noted at once how airy and cheerful was the room.
sentences.cn: 他马上觉得那间屋子空气流通,真叫人觉得痛快.

sentences.en: Her house is light and airy, crisp and clean.
sentences.cn: 她的房子光线充足，空气流通，清新整洁。

sentences.en: Her moments were as light and airy as those of a butterfly.
sentences.cn: 她的动作轻捷、飘忽;象蝴蝶飞舞一般.

sentences.en: It was large and airy and faced St. Charles Avenue.
sentences.cn: 它宽敞、通风,朝向圣查尔斯街.

sentences.en: Mark followed the teacher into a large airy room.
sentences.cn: 马克跟着老师进入一间宽敞的空气新鲜的大房间.

sentences.en: Pearl was decked out with airy gaiety.
sentences.cn: 她把珠儿打扮得花枝招展.
诗人们写过 “ 空中之声 ” 这类诗句.

sentences.en: The bathroom has a light and airy feel.
sentences.cn: 浴室给人以明亮通风之感。

sentences.en: The large window makes the room quite airy.
sentences.cn: 大窗子使房间通风良好.

sentences.en: The living room is decorated in pale colours that make it all the more airy.
sentences.cn: 起居室装饰成淡雅的颜色，显得更加宽敞明亮。

sentences.en: The office was light and airy.
The whole effect is cool, light and airy.
sentences.cn: 整体效果很酷，轻松而随意。

sentences.en: With the shutters half-closed and the calm airy height of the room to lull me, I soon fell into a doze.
sentences.cn: 半掩的百叶窗和宁静、通风的高大房间催我入睡，我很快便打起盹来。

words.tran_cn: 不通风的；没有风的；缺少空气的
空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调

trans.tran_cn: 空气的，空中的，轻快的，通风的
trans.tran_en: an airy room or building has plenty of fresh air because it is large or has a lot of windows
